scripts.build-prod: npm run prep-prod && npm run bundle && npm run css-purge && parcel build prod/index.html
scripts.gen-css: tailwindcss build css/tailwind_inputs.css -o dev/tailwind.css && cat dev/tailwind.css | ./css/css2purs.py > src/Tailwind.purs
scripts.lock-css: npm run bundle && npm run css-purge && cat prod/tailwind.css | ./css/css2purs.py > src/Tailwind.purs
